meanings.definition: Refer to something briefly or casually.
meanings.sent1: She keeps mentioning her favorite book during our conversations.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy mentioning my hobbies when meeting new people.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't stop mentioning his cat, even during a serious discussion.
meanings.sent4: The song kept mentioning memories of the past, making me nostalgic.
meanings.sent5: The teacher kept mentioning the importance of studying for the upcoming test.

meanings.definition: Make reference to something in speech or writing.
meanings.sent1: My friend keeps mentioning her upcoming trip to Europe.
meanings.sent2: I often find myself mentioning my family in my essays.
meanings.sent3: The comedian kept mentioning his love for pizza in his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The novel subtly kept mentioning the protagonist's hidden past.
meanings.sent5: The news anchor kept mentioning the upcoming weather forecast throughout the broadcast.
